txt.en: Tolwin can be found in the hall of Crithost.\n\nYou should speak with Tolwin.

'The people look up to me here but I am just a boy. Perhaps it is in my blood since father was the lord of Cair Andros.'

You ask Tolwin about his excellent fighting techniques.

'I come from a family trained well in the art of war. I learned combat from a very early age. Still, it was not enough against such a powerful man as the one they call The First Blade.'
This Easterling had definitely been slain recently, but by whom and are they still nearby?
The boy commands these people well but seems unsure of himself
The slain Easterling can be found on the roadside in Talath Anor.\n\nYou should investigate the body.
Whoever slew this Sûhalar warrior managed to strike him dead with one blow!
The slain body of a Sûhalar leads you on the trail of a mysterious Sûhalar slayer.
